data.enText: a chemical element. Hydrogen is a gas that is the lightest of all the elements. It combines with oxygen to form water.

simple_means.memory_skill: hydr 水 + -o- 无实义 + gen 出生

tr: a nonmetallic univalent element that is normally a colorless and odorless highly flammable diatomic gas
the simplest and lightest and most abundant element in the universe

value.def: Hydrogen is a colourless gas that is the lightest and commonest element in the universe.

trans: (常用来漂浅头发或杀死细菌的)过氧化氢，双氧水
